text: @JoeBiden Trump doesn't have the capability to lead and even if he did, he doesn't want to. It's clear he + the GOP want COVID-19 to kill off Americans, esp people of color, the poor, the elderly, inmates, blue state citizens—anyone who either won't vote for them or receives SS or any aid.
